about_the_game:
Budget Guardian: Health Realm (DEMO) combines engaging gameplay with educational elements, making complex financial concepts both accessible and enjoyable.

Welcome to the whimsical world of Hindmarchville, where the villagers have elected a cat as their mayor, leading to some peculiar occurrences. In this casual simulation adventure, you play as Aayto, a dedicated health professional who has come to town to establish a care centre. However, as you assist the villagers, you soon discover that their strange behaviour might be more than just small-town eccentricities.

Your mission? Unravel the mystery behind Hindmarchville’s odd happenings while managing the care centre’s finances. You’ll need to balance budgets, optimise resources, and make strategic decisions to keep the centre running smoothly—all while delving into the intricacies of healthcare finance.

Can you solve the village’s mystery and ensure the care centre prospers under the leadership of a feline mayor?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8350 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 270 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Assist Aayto in establishing a care centre in Hindmarchville to treat residents exhibiting unusual behaviours. In this point-and-click game, you'll diagnose, treat, and release patients. Can you manage to generate a profit and gain some valuable financial knowledge?
